title: I just played with what I am 100% sure is the worst team ever in the history of League of Legends
body:
https://imgur.com/Sl2QgBa

Now, every team I get is 100% pure high born trash. My only wins most days are those games where I somehow carry. But this particular game my team has the 4 worst players of every player that currently plays and has ever played worldwide in the entire history of this game. I won't be surprised if they were the worst players in the entire history of the MOBA genre. I am not joking when I say this but beginner bots are better than my 4 team mates in this game. Normally I'd just move on but something nags at me. I don't feel this should just be ignored. I need to get every single one of these players banned. Anyone know how I can get that done? Like is there anything I can do to make sure that none of my 4 team mates ever gets to play a single game of League ever again for as long as they live? Help me out here. I already have to deal with ordinary every day trash but this is a whole other level. A line needs to be drawn!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jln3mi0vfJU

UPDATE:

I ACTUALLY RAN INTO ANOTHER TEAM THAT IS JUST AS BAD. 

https://imgur.com/YtXODYv

These players as well as the first 4 make up the 8 worst players in the history of this game. How am I this unfortunate to meet the worst 8 players to ever play League.

replies.body: I mean...you have some pretty bad games in your match history, as bad as these people. And the fact that you’re posting this on an alternate account means you’re hiding something, and they probably weren’t as bad as you say.

Hiding what? I have many accounts. My main account is banned from posting and from playing. After my main got perm'd I made some accounts and I play on all of them. I'm not gonna bother listing all of them for no reason. This is the one I'm currently posting on and that's that.

> [{quoted}](name=FeedKaylePlease,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-01-25T11:27:12.958+0000)
>
> Hiding what? I have many accounts. My main account is banned from posting and from playing. After my main got perm'd I made some accounts and I play on all of them. I'm not gonna bother listing all of them for no reason. This is the one I'm currently posting on and that's that.

You purposely hid your name. You have horrible feeding games on this account as well (as bad as this) so if they should be banned, you should be as well.

Those are pre-30 troll infested games. Who gives a flying fuck what happens in those games. I'm talking about ranked where people are supposed to actually not be mentally challenged. They could go be mentally challenged in Normals, I don't care. I just need these shits gone from ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=FeedKaylePlease,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-25T22:59:59.223+0000)
>
> Those are pre-30 troll infested games. Who gives a flying fuck what happens in those games. I'm talking about ranked where people are supposed to actually not be mentally challenged. They could go be mentally challenged in Normals, I don't care. I just need these shits gone from ranked.

Provide the match history from op.gg so we can see what really happened then.

I can do better than that. I can tell you what happened so you don't have to spend the time doing forensics.

This is what happened. My team fed. They never stopped feeding. We lost.
Post the op.gg match history so we can watch it...unless you're lying and are trying to hide something.
This thread about these 4 garbage ass feeders. My match history is irrelevant to this.

And yet you have fed more in your games. You’re scared to show us your real account where this happened because you know they aren’t actually any worse than you and showing us would prove that if they deserve to be banned, you deserve it more.
Again, this isn't about my other accounts or any of that. It's about those four garbage ass feeding pieces of trash.
And you’re refusing to provide any actual evidence of that, and until you do we have to assume you are lying and they didn’t actually feed.
I did provide evidence. If that's not enough for you, I don't care. Believe me, or don't. Makes little difference to me.

You provided 0 actual evidence. You already edited the photo to put arrows and block names, how should we know you also didn’t edit the scores.
We now know for a fact you 100% lied. You are too scared to simply link the op.gg for the match, which means you lied. Simple as that.
These players will NEVER get banned, as you cannot, and will not supply actual evidence that they deserve to be banned. So you can sit there, knowing that they never will be banned.

You’ve already told us you’re willing to hack riots servers to get them banned, whats a little photo editing compared to that?

> [{quoted}](name=Degnisyllort,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-27T15:57:36.159+0000)
>
> You provided 0 actual evidence. You already edited the photo to put arrows and block names

I see now. You are new here.

Your unwillingness to show the account this happened on (where we can watch what happened for ourselves) shows us all that you are most likely hiding something, as Degnisyllort said.

Show us the PROOF, or admit you're wrong and delete this post.
I already provided proof of what happened in my original post. Wait a second, do you think I faked that image? Really dude?

That image doesn't explain everything that happened in the game. You providing the actual account/match history would let us watch it and see what happened. 
Yes I think you are lying that they are the "worst team ever", as you refuse to provide any actual proof. And yes, pictures can be faked.

If you think I'd go through all that trouble to fake an image like this for you guys then you severely overestimate your importance. I wouldn't say that I don't care about any of you, but I certainly don't care enough to fake this.

to be fair: its hard to have a decent score when your team goes 0/20.

and 0/23 in a 20min game really is something else lol.

BUT we also had "perfect" games in the lec and lcs before (one team having 0 deaths) so yeah.

> [{quoted}](name=JustA kleo,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2020-01-25T11:35:44.940+0000)
>
> to be fair: its hard to have a decent score when your team goes 0/20.
> 
> and 0/23 in a 20min game really is something else lol.
> 
> BUT we also had "perfect" games in the lec and lcs before (one team having 0 deaths) so yeah.

His team wasn’t 0-20 in the game where he fed though...he was the one feeding, going (for example) 1-8 in a 16 min game, while the remainder of his team was positive. If the game continued for another 5 min, his botlane could have had a better score than that. To demand that they be banned when he’s had just as many bad games means that he also should be banned.

yeah his demand of having these ppl banned for a bad game is ridiculous.
i didnt check his other games, im just saying you could be faker, but if your team is feeding like crazy even faker wont go 10/0.

The rest of his team in the game where he went 1/8/0 was not doing well. Also, Shaco into Lee Sin favors Lee Sin very very strongly, and you probably won't win unless you're a top tier Shaco player. His supp was 2/12/2. He's playing on a new account with new players against bad matchups and complicated champions (people still don't know what Aphelios does, even in ranked).

He is absolutely wrong that the team in the game he posted should be banned, but you're making the same mistake of calling him a feeder when he just had a bad game.

> [{quoted}](name=Luigi Nooooo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=0001000100000001,timestamp=2020-01-25T18:32:22.599+0000)
>
> The rest of his team in the game where he went 1/8/0 was not doing well. Also, Shaco into Lee Sin favors Lee Sin very very strongly, and you probably won't win unless you're a top tier Shaco player. His supp was 2/12/2. He's playing on a new account with new players against bad matchups and complicated champions (people still don't know what Aphelios does, even in ranked).
> 
> He is absolutely wrong that the team in the game he posted should be banned, but you're making the same mistake of calling him a feeder when he just had a bad game.

I’m simply pointing out that he’s had games like they did, so if they should be punished, he should as well. Reading comprehension too hard for you or something?

Have you tried stepping away from the computer and trying to calm down?
You can't get people banned for having a bad game, no matter how bad you think they are. Step away, calm down and move on to the next game.
If this was normals they were probably new to the game or something. people need to go outside. get a job, maybe

I swear to God, if I were a hacker, I would have been dedicated all my time, the rest of my life if that is what it took, to figuring out how to hack Riot's servers and ban all of these shit stains myself. I spend a lot of time "moving on to the next game". I tolerate a lot of shit and I mean a whole lot of shit but this is over doing it. This shit needs to have consequences.

> [{quoted}](name=FeedKaylePlease,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-01-24T23:49:19.045+0000)
>
> I swear to God, if I were a hacker, I would have been dedicated all my time, the rest of my life if that is what it took, to figuring out how to hack Riot's servers and ban all of these shit stains myself. I spend a lot of time "moving on to the next game". I tolerate a lot of shit and I mean a whole lot of shit but this is over doing it. This shit needs to have consequences.

This is a classic case of someone investing too much of their life in a video game. Your perspective is all out of whack. You think the video game actually holds some value outside of just being a fun way to kill time.
Getting feeding trash ass noobshits banned is a fun way to kill time.

> [{quoted}](name=FeedKaylePlease,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2020-01-25T11:28:59.119+0000)
>
> Getting feeding trash ass noobshits banned is a fun way to kill time.

So then you should be banned too?
sounds like a colossal waste of time
Getting shit stains banned is never a waste of time.
Idk man....maybe get a job or something
That will be my job.
Lol no Riot isnt dumb enough to ban players simply for being bad at their game.
You can’t ban players for being bad, or else nobody would be able to play and get good, stop playing solo queue is the moral of the story

> [{quoted}](name=FeedKaylePlease,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-01-24T23:43:15.403+0000)
>
> https://imgur.com/Sl2QgBa
> 
> Now, every team I get is 100% pure high born trash. My only wins most days are those games where I somehow carry. But this particular game my team has the 4 worst players of every player that currently plays and has ever played worldwide in the entire history of this game. I won't be surprised if they were the worst players in the entire history of the MOBA genre. I am not joking when I say this but beginner bots are better than my 4 team mates in this game. Normally I'd just move on but something nags at me. I don't feel this should just be ignored. I need to get every single one of these players banned. Anyone know how I can get that done? Like is there anything I can do to make sure that none of my 4 team mates ever gets to play a single game of League ever again for as long as they live? Help me out here. I already have to deal with ordinary every day trash but this is a whole other level. A line needs to be drawn!
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jln3mi0vfJU

OP, I understand the feeling of being pit with terrible teammates that you simply cannot carry. However, you can't get teammates banned for playing poorly or being bad. Think about it and look at the bright side! Its possible that you could be getting those 4 teammates on the enemy team sometime. If Riot started banning players who played poorly then all the divisions would slip down a pedestal. Meaning, Gold would turn to Silver, Silver to Bronze and Bronze? To Iron. Not sure what happens to Iron players though. 

My point is, bad players are as important to you and everyone else sitting at a higher ranking as the Challengers are for competitive gaming. Everyone comes together to create the ladder. Supposing you had the power to ban players who played poorly, you'd end up banning like 50% of those in your own elo  (Average 50% win ratio) and everyone below. And that won't help you, if anything. It'd make it harder for you to climb up. {{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
Thank you for reminding us that there's always someone out there who is suffering more. If you draw your line I will show you a circle around everything.

If you’re toxic in game and receive consistent reports, you actually get placed in what is called Low Priority Queue, which holds players like this. These reports can consist of both legitimate and illegitimate reports I believe (so if you die like 2 times and get reported for Afking in a 50 minute game, it can still place you lower in queue unfortunately). The only way you can avoid this is basically mute all and be positive. __
Idk why this is downvoted but you’re right

This isn't DOTA and Prisoners Island is a thing Riot is against. Which is what they describe as LPQ in this case.

Leagues LPQ is simply a timer from leaving/afking to often in a short period.
Cool

> [{quoted}](name=50CaliberHecate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Z8ikWN8i,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-01-25T00:07:28.814+0000)
>
> If you’re toxic in game and receive consistent reports, you actually get placed in what is called Low Priority Queue, which holds players like this. These reports can consist of both legitimate and illegitimate reports I believe (so if you die like 2 times and get reported for Afking in a 50 minute game, it can still place you lower in queue unfortunately). The only way you can avoid this is basically mute all and be positive. __

You only get LPQ if you’re afk in games, occasionally dependent on reports (I assume).  

“Illegitimate” reports, or rather, games where you didn’t do anything wrong yet were still reported, do not affect your account.
Bump. Updated. I found another 4 players that qualify as the worst of the worst.
